title: 游戏时间
author: shuoqi_yuan
txt_content:
讨论一下大家玩minecraft有多长时间了
我有1年半了（新手）

replies.txt_content: 玩了很久了= =！（应该有3年了）

replies.author: pkyou1124
replies.txt_content:
路過發一下各版發佈日期
Full Version: November 2011
Classic: May 17, 2009
Beta: December 20, 2010

Other versions

 Indev: December 23, 2009
Infdev: February 27, 2010
Alpha: June 28, 2010

LZ在A版時就在玩了,圍觀野生老人

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 我從今年三月份, 1.3_01開始玩... 半年... 超嫩新手...

replies.author: shuoqi_yuan
replies.txt_content: 给点人气行吗？我人品不好

replies.author: qrox
replies.txt_content: 我C版出来时就在玩。。。大丈夫？
